sentences.en: All the moves of the ballerina were graceful.
sentences.cn: 那位芭蕾舞演员的所有动作都是很美的.

sentences.en: As the wheel turned, the potter shaped and squeezed the lump of clay into a graceful shape.
sentences.cn: 随着陶轮的转动，制陶工人缓慢挤压陶泥块，塑出优美的造型。

sentences.en: Aubrey could think of no graceful way to escape Corbet's company.
sentences.cn: 奥布里想不出有什么得体的办法能摆脱科比特。

sentences.en: He admired the graceful, supple movements of the dancers.
sentences.cn: 他赞扬了舞蹈演员优雅灵巧的舞姿.

sentences.en: He was charming, cheerful, and graceful under pressure.
sentences.cn: 他在重压之下依然开朗迷人，风度优雅。

sentences.en: Her movements were graceful and elegant.
sentences.cn: 她举手投足优雅而高贵。

sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 他的字从小就写得流畅优美。

sentences.en: His movements on the parallel bars were very graceful.
His refusal was worded in such a graceful way that we could not be offended.
sentences.cn: 他婉言谢绝,无损于我们的颜面.

sentences.en: Mt . Fuji has a graceful shape.
The actor made a graceful exit.
sentences.cn: 该演员的下场动作十分优美.

sentences.en: The ballet dancer is so graceful.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞演员的姿态是如此的优美.

sentences.en: The branches formed a graceful curve.
sentences.cn: 那些树枝形成一条优美的曲线。

sentences.en: The dancers were all tall and graceful.
sentences.cn: 这些舞蹈演员都个子高高的，动作十分优雅。

sentences.en: The potter shaped and squeezed the lump of clay into a graceful shape.
sentences.cn: 制陶工人把黏土块捏塑成优美的形状。

words.tran_cn: 纤弱的，细长的；纤细优美的

trans.tran_cn: 优美的，优雅的，雅致的，美好的，得体的，飘逸
trans.tran_en: moving in a smooth and attractive way, or having an attractive shape or form
